Issue.creator: sergey-shilov
Issue.summary: Modify applying of the rules stored in the auth_map according to changes made by INDY-1728 and INDY-1729
Issue.description: Since we have modified/extended _auth_map_ we need to implement applying of authorization rules that define quorums for important actions (implemented in scope of INDY-1729) and modify applying of other rules stored in the _auth_map_ as they may be changed in scope of INDY-1728.
